title: Heera Jadau Haaram with Emerald Pendant
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic Polki diamond setting in a traditional Jadau style. The necklace features two rows of round Polki diamonds, interspersed with unique square diamond segments that add a modern geometric touch. The centerpiece is a stunning emerald pendant framed by meticulously set Polki diamonds in a floral motif, echoing traditional Mughal influences seen in Hyderabadi jewelry. The back features intricate gold work showcasing superior craftsmanship.
description: This Heera Jadau Haaram is a timeless investment, seamlessly blending traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. The Polki diamonds offer a unique brilliance, while the emerald pendant adds a touch of regal elegance. Crafted from high-quality 22K gold and genuine gemstones, this piece is designed to be treasured for generations. Owning this Haaram is a symbol of heritage, luxury, and impeccable style. Perfect as a bridal piece or a significant addition to any fine jewelry collection.
